Question: In June 2011, this person embarked on the Femme Fatale Tour.
Hints: The April 1999 cover of Rolling Stone featured this person lying on her bed, clad with a bra, shorts and an open top.
In February 2006, pictures surfaced of this person driving with her son Sean, on her lap instead of in a car seat.
This person was named as Most Searched Person in the Guinness World Records book edition 2007 and 2009.
